messages.message:
I'm trying to update some `.html` files that are used as templates to render pages in `webapp` , but I can't figure out how to make `webapp` pick up the changes. (Rebuilding and restarting didn't seem to do anything). Is that supported for the frontend template on Crafting?
The sandbox is https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/weimingwu?cw=dev

Could you try the following?
```cs sandbox update -D 'dev/env[WEBAPP_LITE_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[WEBAPP_ENABLED]=1'
workspace setup```
possibly need to restart webapp too
Yep that did it (after a bit of finagling in my sandbox)
